document.full_text: hedge fund founder raj rajaratnam had foot surgery and did not appear in court on monday while jurors deliberated for a sixth day in his insider trading trial without reaching a verdict.
document.title: raj rajaratnam has infected foot, absent as jury meets
lines_and_colors: hedge fund founder raj rajaratnam had foot surgery and did not appear in court on monday while jurors deliberated for a sixth day in his insider trading trial without reaching a verdict.
